name: Noa•Journalism,narrated
0:
”Alexa, open Noa”
”Alexa, ask Noa to play The New York Times”
”Alexa, ask Noa to play the latest Financial news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: noa
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stay informed no matter where life takes you with human-narrated articles from the best publishers in the world including The New York Times, Bloomberg, Financial Times, The Economist and more.

The Noa Alexa skill allows you to listen to narrated articles of your favourite journalists, publishers and categories. 
Simply ask Alexa to "Play Noa" and stay informed with what's making the papers.

To get started, we recommend trying some of these popular phrases:
- Listen by publisher: "Play Bloomberg"
- Listen by columnist: "Play Gillian Tett"
- Listen by topic: "Play Business"
- Or simply listen to our latest content: "Play latest"

For reference, see below for the full list of supported publishers, topics and journalists:

PUBLISHERS
- The New York Times
- Financial Times
- The Economist
- Bloomberg
- The Independent (UK)
- The Irish Times
- Business Insider
- Evening Standard

TOPICS
- Business
- Finance
- Politics
- Technology
- Science
- Lifestyle
- Sport

JOURNALISTS
We support over 1500 journalists - too many to list them all! But here's some top columnists for you to try out:

Columnists - The New York Times
- Thomas Friedman | Foreign Affairs Columnist
- Nicholas Kristof | Two-time Pulitzer Prize winner
- Andrew Ross Sorkin | DealBook Editor & Founder

Columnists - Financial Times
- Andrew Hill | Management Director
- Martin Wolf | Chief Economics Editor
- John Gapper | Chief Business Commentator
- Gillian Tett | US Editor

Columnists - The Irish Times
- Christ Johns | Brexit & Economics Commentator
- Dave Hannigan | US Sport Columnist
- David McWilliams | Economics Columnist
- Fintan O'Toole | Columnist & Writer
- Karlin Lillington | Business Columnist
- Ken Early | Soccer Writer
- Proinsias O'Mahony | Markets Commentator
- Una Mullally | Social Affairs Commentator

Columnists - The Independent (UK)
- Ben Chu | Economics Editor
- Mary Dejevsky | Foreign Affairs Writer
- Patrick Cockburn | Middle East Correspondent
- Robert Fisk | Middle East Correspondent
- Sean O'Grady | Political and Economics Columnist
